value:
Luke, Roderick, Cecil, Ryan...and then
Katarina of course... I hope all my old
platoonmates are well.

Prince Marth lost his country and his
father. He carries a pain shared by
every Altean atop his own.

My grandfather said if I wanted to
truly serve Altea, as he did, there was
one thing I must never do: cook.

As a royal guard, my duty is to keep
Prince Marth safe. Even in unfamiliar
worlds, that remains true.

HAH! ...Heee-YAH! ...Having fun
watching from the sidelines? That's
what summoners do, I suppose...

I am Kris, of the Altean royal guard.
This is for $Nu.

My grandfather always said power
without a path is mere brutality. That
is why I follow Prince Marth's path!

In time, we will be victorious. Prince
Marth will rule a world at peace.

It's a good thing my grandfather
isn't here to see this...
I can make use of this. Thank you.

I'm Kris, knight of Altea and royal
guard to the hero Prince Marth.
But...you can just call me Kris.

Does the power to summon make
one strong? Strong enough to slay
even the most fearsome dragons?$k$pThat's why I train. I want to be just
as strong as the heroes I admire.$k$pBut the joy of getting stronger leads
to wanting more and more, and along
the way I've come to crave battle.$k$pGrandfather warned me about power
without principle... As I get stronger,
I wonder if I may stray from the path.$k$pBut possessing a heart that can resist
the draw toward darkness...that's the
mark of a true hero.$k$pNaturally, Prince Marth has such
a heart, but...I sense the same
in you. So, I'm happy at your side.
たあっ
How's this!
うっ…
Damn...!
I'll see you gone.
I must not lose!
This is what I've trained for.
For Prince Marth!
Disappointing...
Laugh
Well met. I am called Kris. I hail from Sera. It's a small village, but it's home.
Whoa! Is this how you train knights?
My grandather was a knight, and he taught me of battle. He was rather strict about it, truth told.
Do you read a lot of books? Might you lend me a treatise on tactics? I'd appreciate it.
My allies are remarkable people. After the War of Shadows, they didn't falter.
Would I protect Prince Marth, I must become stronger still.
Though I could be stronger, I truly wish to help.
I see...
This way?
Let me be your strength.
